short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vault+ is the gateway to trusted transactions. Manage, and share your digital identity and Web3 assets in a single secure app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vault+ is the gateway to trusted transactions - store, manage, and share your digital identity and Web3 assets in a single secure application and trust the claims of all parties to a transaction. 

Vault+ gives you access to the first end-to-end blockchain ecosystem where you can interact and transact digitally with complete control over your data - including what you share, with whom, and how they use it.  Securely access applications built on SERV's Seneca Blockchain, as well as store and manage tokens, NFTs, and other digital assets - all the while knowing your private data is securely stored on your device. 

SERV's Seneca blockchain enables a multifaceted exchange of trust: user identity, credentialing and enhanced privacy to facilitate deeper relationships between users. In other words, SERV's Seneca enables trusted transactions and communication between entities by providing verification of the attributes and claims of each party.  

You can also learn more at seneca.tech or chat with developers on Discord (https://discord.gg/XpV6bAW43e).

Welcome to Vault+!

== Features ==

✓ Private data storage

✓ Access to verifiers that turn data into shareable credentials

✓ Private communication with verifiers and dApps to share data or credentials off-chain

✓ Secured login and authentications

✓ Store and manage valuable digital assets

✓ Use a single credential to share and control data across multiple apps

✓ Manage digital identity and secure private data

✓ Send and receive cryptocurrencies

✓ Connect seamlessly to traditional applications


== Feedback and bug reports ==

https://www.joinserv.com/contact
